name: BABY ON THE RUN!
description:
Catch Your Brother Before He Runs Away!

NOTE: THE GAME NOT LOADING BUG HAS BEEN FIXED, Also, If Game doesn't play the intro music or if space isn't working on startup, Just refresh the page and that should most likely so the trick!

Controls:

Escape/ Esc to Exit full screen

F for full screen

Space to Jump/ Start Game/ Earthquake (Earthquake is when you try to press the space button in the town)

A is to Talk, Retry game on Try Again Screen

Also The Liluo Link is Here: https://liluo.io/jampower/baby-on-the-run
